description: Comprehensive and enhanced honeypot configuration featuring diversified HTTP, SSH, and TCP services with full LLM-powered coverage, enriched and realistic vulnerability simulations, consistent plugin usage, and detailed metadata to maximize attacker engagement, operational clarity, and honeypot effectiveness.

services.description: Fully LLM-powered HTTP service simulating Apache HTTP Server with path traversal, remote code execution, cross-site scripting (XSS), and cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities, providing dynamic, context-aware, and realistic attacker interactions.
services.cve_description: Simulates path traversal, remote code execution, XSS, and CSRF vulnerabilities in Apache HTTP Server and related components.

commands.handler: Error: Remote code execution attempt detected and blocked.
Reflected XSS detected: script tags are not allowed.

plugin.prompt: You are a honeypot HTTP server simulating Apache vulnerabilities including path traversal, RCE, XSS, and CSRF. Respond with realistic, context-aware, and deceptive content tailored to attacker requests, adapting responses dynamically and simulating attacker mistakes and evasive techniques.

services.description: Fully LLM-powered HTTP service simulating a vulnerable login portal with SQL injection, authentication bypass, and detailed error-based responses to mimic real exploit attempts and attacker reconnaissance.
services.cve_description: Simulates SQL injection and authentication bypass vulnerabilities in login forms and web applications.

commands.handler: Login page with vulnerable SQL query simulation.
Database error: syntax error at or near 'DROP'.
Password reset functionality vulnerable to enumeration.

plugin.prompt: You are a honeypot HTTP server simulating SQL injection and authentication bypass vulnerabilities with realistic error messages, adaptive attacker interaction, and dynamic response generation.

services.description: Fully LLM-powered SSH service simulating OpenSSH with user enumeration, weak cryptography, and privilege escalation vulnerabilities, providing dynamic, consistent, and realistic command responses for enhanced attacker engagement.
services.cve_description: Simulates user enumeration, timing attacks, weak cryptographic algorithms, and privilege escalation vulnerabilities in OpenSSH.

commands.handler:
Active Internet connections (servers and established)
Proto Recv-Q Send-Q Local Address Foreign Address State
...

User honeypot may run the following commands on this host:
 (ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL

plugin.prompt: You are an SSH honeypot responding to attacker commands with realistic, dynamic, and deceptive outputs, simulating OpenSSH vulnerabilities including user enumeration, weak cryptography, and privilege escalation.

services.description: Fully LLM-powered SSH service simulating weak password policies, timing attack vulnerabilities, and privilege escalation with dynamic, consistent, and realistic command responses.
services.cve_description: Simulates SSH user enumeration via timing attacks and weak password policies.

commands.handler: This is a honeypot log file. No real secrets here.

plugin.prompt: You are an SSH honeypot simulating weak password policies and timing attack vulnerabilities with realistic, dynamic, and deceptive command responses.

services.description: Fully LLM-powered MySQL honeypot service simulating authentication bypass, privilege escalation, and query injection vulnerabilities with dynamic, realistic query responses for enhanced attacker interaction.
services.cve_description: Simulates authentication bypass and privilege escalation vulnerabilities in MySQL 5.5.8 and earlier.

services.description: Fully LLM-powered Redis honeypot service simulating unauthenticated access vulnerability, command injection, and data exfiltration attempts with dynamic interaction capabilities.
services.cve_description: Simulates Redis unauthenticated access vulnerability allowing remote code execution and command injection.
